sentence.Network_en: Romantic chateaux and castles overlook the river's twisting course.
sentence.Network_cn: 富有浪漫气息的庄园和城堡俯瞰着蜿蜒的河道。

sentence.Network_en: They visIt'some ancient chateaux while they stay in france.
sentence.Network_cn: 在法国逗留期间他们参观了一些古城堡.

sentence.Network_en: You can also hear concerts in the chateaux and cathedrals.
sentence.Network_cn: 你也可以在皇宫或教堂里聆听音乐会.

auth_sentence.content: We are only here for the weekend so our aim is to bag a few chateaux, taste a few wines and sample the local cheese.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are only here for the weekend so our aim is to bag a few chateaux, taste a few wines and sample the local cheese.

auth_sentence.content: You can easily do two or three chateaux in day but that's only if you avoid the temptations of the flesh.

auth_sentence.content: As we move forward, I glimpse a handful of fabulous chateaux poking out from between the trees high above the waterline.
